## Introduction to Projects  
![](https://youtu.be/xxxxx){width="90%"}  
  
At the end of each module, we present a choice of projects for completion. Choose one or many projects to practice the skills learned in this module. 
  
1. Navigate to the desired project and watch the introduction to the video, then pause when directed.  
2. Download the pre-populated file and move it to your working project directory  
3. Do your best to carry-out the project tasks
4. If you get stuck at anytime, unpause the video for a demonstration of one possible solution
